videogames.name: Grand Theft Auto V
videogames.description: Rockstar Games went bigger, since their previous installment of the series.

videogames.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
videogames.description: The third game in a series, it holds nothing back from the player. Open world adventures of the renowned monster slayer Geralt of Rivia are now even on a larger scale.

videogames.name: Portal 2
videogames.description: Portal 2 draws from the award-winning formula of innovative gameplay, immersive story, and creative inclusion of music, which earned the original Portal over 70 industry accolades.

videogames.name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive
videogames.description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered when it was launched 19 years ago.

videogames.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
videogames.description: America, 1899. The end of the Wild West era has begun. After a robbery goes badly wrong in the western town of Blackwater, Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang are forced to flee.

videogames.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
videogames.description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is an online tactical shooter video game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft.

videogames.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
videogames.description: The next chapter in the highly anticipated Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the makers of the 2006 and 2008 Games of the Year, Bethesda Game Studios.

videogames.name: Apex Legends
videogames.description: Conquer with character in Apex Legends, a free-to-play Battle Royale shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame & fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

videogames.name: Destiny 2
videogames.description: Humanity's last safe city has fallen to an overwhelming invasion force, led by Ghaul, the imposing commander of the brutal Red Legion.

videogames.name: Minecraft
videogames.description: Minecraft is a game made up of blocks, creatures, and community. Players can survive the night or build a work of art â€“ the choice is all yours.

videogames.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
videogames.description: Five years ago, Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas, a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption.

videogames.name: Overwatch 2
videogames.description: Overwatch 2 is a free-to-play, always-on, and ever-evolving live game. Team up with friends regardless of platform and jump into the reimagined PvP experience.

videogames.name: Fallout 4
videogames.description: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Fallout 3 and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, welcome you to the world of Fallout 4.

videogames.name: Among Us
videogames.description: An online and local party game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space!

videogames.name: Half-Life 2
videogames.description: 1998. HALF-LIFE sends a shock through the game industry with its combination of pounding action and continuous, immersive storytelling.

videogames.name: Cyberpunk 2077
videogames.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

videogames.name: Rocket League
videogames.description: Rocket League is a high-powered hybrid of arcade-style soccer and vehicular mayhem with easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven competition.

videogames.name: Call of Duty: Warzone
videogames.description: Welcome to Warzone, the new massive free-to-play combat arena from the world of Modern Warfare.

videogames.name: Fortnite
videogames.description: Fortnite is the living, action building game using Unreal Engine 4 from Epic Games. You and your friends will lead a group of Heroes to reclaim and rebuild a homeland that has been left empty by mysterious darkness only known as 'the Storm'.

videogames.name: Terraria
videogames.description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this action-packed adventure game. Four Pack also available!

videogames.name: Left 4 Dead 2
videogames.description: Set in the zombie apocalypse, Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2) is the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, the #1 co-op game of 2008.

videogames.name: Stardew Valley
videogames.description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life.

videogames.name: Garry's Mod
videogames.description: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

videogames.name: The Sims 4
videogames.description: Play with life and discover the possibilities. Unleash your imagination and create a world of Sims that's wholly unique.

videogames.name: Team Fortress 2
videogames.description: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

videogames.name: BioShock Infinite
videogames.description: Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on the line, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and now hired gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean.

videogames.name: Halo Infinite
videogames.description: When all hope is lost and humanity's fate hangs in the balance, Master Chief is ready to confront the most ruthless foe he's ever faced.

videogames.name: Valorant
videogames.description: Blend your style and experience on a global, competitive stage. You have 13 rounds to attack and defend your side using sharp gunplay and tactical abilities.

videogames.name: God of War
videogames.description: His vengeance against the Gods of Olympus years behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the realm of Norse Gods and monsters.

videogames.name: Hollow Knight
videogames.description: Forge your own path in Hollow Knight! An epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes.

videogames.name: Fall Guys
videogames.description: Fall Guys is a free, cross-platform massively multiplayer party royale game. Clumsily compete in absurd obstacle courses with friends or build your very own chaotic course to share with the community.

videogames.name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
videogames.description: Welcome back to Vice City. Welcome back to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile.

videogames.name: Elden Ring
videogames.description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

videogames.name: Resident Evil 4
videogames.description: Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City.

videogames.name: Dark Souls III
videogames.description: Dark Souls continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series.

videogames.name: Super Mario Odyssey
videogames.description: Explore incredible places far from the Mushroom Kingdom as you join Mario and his new ally Cappy on a massive, globe-trotting 3D adventure.

videogames.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
videogames.description: Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

videogames.name: Baldur's Gate 3
videogames.description: Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power.

videogames.name: Hades
videogames.description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.

videogames.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
videogames.description: Escape to a deserted island and create your own paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game.
